fi.tamk.tiko.androidpaint

Class DrawPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tamk.tiko.androidpaint.DrawPath

  • public class DrawPath
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that is used to save lines drawn on canvas. Contains information about the color, style, width and location of the lines.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DrawPath(int color, boolean emboss, boolean blur, int strokeWidth, Path path, Paint.Cap cap)
      Constructs the object and sets its attributes.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrawPath

        public DrawPath(int color,
                boolean emboss,
                boolean blur,
                int strokeWidth,
                Path path,
                Paint.Cap cap)
        Constructs the object and sets its attributes.
        Parameters:
        color - The color in which the line was drawn.
        emboss - Whether the line had an emboss effect applied to it or not.
        blur - Whether the line had a blur effect applied to it or not.
        strokeWidth - The width of the drawn line.
        path - The path of the drawn line.
        cap - The paint cap that was used to draw the line (round or square).
